body:
Hi Christopher,

I will confirm that Blender exports OBJ that can be converted to
Radiance. It also has a few tools for doing operations on meshes. It is
a pretty robust application so there is some learning curve for sure.

Best,

-Jack

--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
